marklogic.body: This "child"was 6'3'.Why are they using pictures of the kid that are 4 years old?Other witnesses tell of the kid whaling on Zimmerman.On a tape at the police station there is clearly a gash at the back of his head.I've had my nose broken TWICE-it did not Bleed nor "gush" either time.This is a media and Leftist driven lynching and you people are nothing more than the equivalent of a bloodthirsty KKK mob from the Twenties- you . should be ashamed of yourselves.That POS who is the President(not for much longer)just Ensured Zimmerman cannot be fairly tried anywhere in America.He won't face trial because of that but someone will murder him and each one of you scum will have his blood your hands.
